commits.message: chore(ralph): update orchestrator state for fire likelihood goal

verification: Ran: git status --porcelain=v1 (checked for artifacts and unrelated changes)
Ran: git diff --check (checked for whitespace errors in staged files)
Ran: git diff --cached --stat (reviewed staged changes before commit)
Ran: git commit -m 'chore(ralph): update orchestrator state for fire likelihood goal'
Ran: git log -1 --format='%H %s' (verified commit SHA and message)
Ran: git status --porcelain=v1 (confirmed clean commit, only ephemeral Ralph files and implementation files remain unstaged)
Would run: jq '.tasks[] | select(.id == "WN-FIRE-004") | .status' .ralph/state.json (would verify WN-FIRE-004 marked as completed)
notes: Committed only Ralph orchestrator state files (state.json, plan.json, state.history.json, GOAL.from_task.md, TASK_QUEUE.json) to reflect goal change from JIT pipeline to Fire Likelihood Score and mark WN-FIRE-004 as completed.
Did NOT commit implementation files (api/*, ui/*, ingest/*) or ephemeral Ralph files (.ralph/inbox/*, .ralph/out/*) - these should be committed separately as part of their respective feature tasks.
Remaining unstaged changes include: implementation files with Fire Likelihood Score feature code, new migrations, and test files that should be committed as part of WN-FIRE-006 and related tasks.
